data.actual_result: It shows as "Disconnected" and jumps you back up to the top of the DM list on the overlay
data.expected_result: It shouldn't do anything or an error message should happen
data.short_description: When calling a bot it doesn't stop you or give an error message
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a bot account to DM you or message a bot - Launch a game  - Launch the Discord Overlay - Go over to the Friends/Start A Call icon - Call the bot
